name: protocol-subgraphs
description: This package contains subgraphs of the Aave protocol v2 and v3

scripts.prepare:subgraph: mustache ./config/${PREFIX}-${NETWORK}-${VERSION}.json ./templates/${BLOCKCHAIN}.subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && rm -rf generated && npm run generate:schema && npm run subgraph:codegen && npm run subgraph:build
scripts.deploy:hosted:avalanche:aave:v2: VERSION=v2 BLOCKCHAIN=avalanche PREFIX=aave NETWORK=avalanche env-cmd npm run prepare:subgraph && SLUG=kustrun/aave-v2-avalanche env-cmd npm run subgraph:deploy:hosted
scripts.deploy:hosted::avalanche:nereus: VERSION=v2 BLOCKCHAIN=avalanche PREFIX=nereus NETWORK=avalanche env-cmd npm run prepare:subgraph && SLUG=kustrun/nereus-finance env-cmd npm run subgraph:deploy:hosted
scripts.forked::avalanche:nereus: VERSION=v2 BLOCKCHAIN=avalanche PREFIX=nereus NETWORK=avalanche SUBGRAPH_ID=QmYx1DKpKrrQSTHMP2EQMjBBmsWKS37q4KXPkKGzhWbHJ1 env-cmd npm run prepare:subgraph && SLUG=kustrun/nereus-finance env-cmd npm run subgraph:deploy:forked
